meanings.definition: biographees: the individuals whose life stories are being written about
meanings.sent1: The biographees in the book were famous historical figures.
meanings.sent2: The biographees of the biography were ordinary people with extraordinary stories.
meanings.sent3: The biographees in the story felt honored to have their lives documented.
meanings.sent4: The biographees' tales intertwined to create a rich tapestry of history.
meanings.sent5: The author brought the biographees to life through vivid storytelling.

meanings.definition: biographees: those who are the subjects of biographies
meanings.sent1: The biographees of the documentary shared their personal experiences.
meanings.sent2: Readers were captivated by the biographees' compelling life stories.
meanings.sent3: The biographees' adventures made for an entertaining read.
meanings.sent4: The biographees' journeys mirrored the struggles of everyday people.
meanings.sent5: The biographees' impact on history was profound and lasting.
